data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Quảng Trị access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Quảng Trị, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Quảng Trị, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary: On average, 104 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Quảng Trị, Vietnam.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, sanctify the 13,337 believers in Quảng Trị and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 123 new simple churches in the state of Quảng Trị, Vietnam. Place a simple church in every community of the 616,600 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bru, Eastern people. 1.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, guide the church in Quảng Trị, Vietnam to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Quảng Trị, Vietnam. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, train the church of Quảng Trị, Vietnam to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

location.name: Quảng Trị
location.cities_list: thị xã Quảng Trị, Ðông Hà, Khe Sanh, Hồ Xá, Hải Lăng
location.cities_list_w_pop: thị xã Quảng Trị (23,356), Ðông Hà (17,662), Khe Sanh, Hồ Xá, Hải Lăng
